Package library.items

Class BookAudio

java.lang.Object
library.items.LibraryItem
library.items.BookMaster
library.items.BookAudio
public class BookAudio extends BookMaster
The BookAudio class represents an audiobook in the library system. It extends the BookMaster class and includes additional attributes like runtime (in hours) and the narrator of the audiobook.

  • Field Summary

    • BookAudio

      public BookAudio(String id, String title, List<Author> authors, String isbn, String publisher, double runtime, String narrator)
      Constructor to create a BookAudio object.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the audiobook.
      title - The title of the audiobook.
      authors - The list of authors associated with the audiobook.
      isbn - The ISBN of the audiobook.
      publisher - The publisher of the audiobook.
      runtime - The length of the audiobook in hours.
      narrator - The name of the narrator for the audiobook.

    • updateDetailsFrom

      public void updateDetailsFrom(LibraryItem updatedItem)
      Updates the details of the current book from another LibraryItem instance. This method specifically checks if the updated item is a BookAudio instance and, if so, copies over its details (title, authors, ISBN, publisher, number of copies, and number of pages). If the provided item is not a BookAudio, the method prints an error message.
      Specified by:
      updateDetailsFrom in class LibraryItem
      Parameters:
      updatedItem - The LibraryItem containing the new data to update this printed book with.
